name: Away the Waste
description:
Fight for the robot vacuum cleaner with garbage bosses. Vacuum up makeshift projectiles and throw them back at the monsters. Defeat all 3 bosses in order to save your beloved.

Press the right mouse button to load projectiles and the left mouse button to shoot. The vacuum cleaner holds 5 projectiles of debris.

Controls:

1.)Fill the magazine to maximum to start shoot

2.) Empty the magazine completely to start attracting shells

A - movement left
D - movement right
Left mouse - attack 
Right mouse - pull shells
